scripts.start-container: docker run --name link-agg -p 3000:3000 -t link-agg npm run start
scripts.start-service: npm run build-image && npm run start-container
scripts.stop-service: docker stop link-agg && docker rm link-agg
scripts.restart-service: npm run stop-service && npm run start-service
scripts.console: npm run build-image && docker run --rm -it link-agg /bin/bash
scripts.test: npm run build-image && docker run --rm -it link-agg ./node_modules/.bin/jest
